trans-unit.source: Hosts a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Aloje uma coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewButtonColumn class is a specialized type of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> class used to logically host cells that respond to simple user input.
trans-unit.target: A classe de DataGridViewButtonColumn é um tipo especializado do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>classe utilizada para alojar logicamente células que responder a intervenção do utilizador simples.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: A DataGridViewButtonColumn has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell> in every <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> that intersects it.
trans-unit.target: Um DataGridViewButtonColumn tem um associada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>em cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>intersetar que o mesmo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>

trans-unit.source: Each cell supplies a user interface (UI) that is similar to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control.
trans-unit.target: Cada célula fornece uma interface de utilizador (IU) que é semelhante a um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: To display the same button text for every cell, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A> property to `true` and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text%2A> property to the desired button text.
trans-unit.target: Para apresentar o texto do botão mesmo para cada célula, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>propriedade `true` e defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text%2A>propriedade para o texto do botão pretendido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default sort mode for this column type is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.
trans-unit.target: O modo de ordenação predefinido para este tipo de coluna é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>

trans-unit.source: To respond to user button clicks, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Para responder a cliques de botão de utilizador, processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick?displayProperty=fullName>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In the event handler, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine whether the click occurred in the button column.
trans-unit.target: De eventos processador, pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para determinar se a, clique em ocorreu na coluna de botão.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine whether the click occurred in a button cell and not on the column header.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para determinar se a, clique em ocorreu numa célula botão e não no cabeçalho da coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When visual styles are enabled, the buttons in a button column are painted using a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer>, and cell styles specified through properties such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> have no effect.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando estilos visuais estiverem ativados, os botões numa coluna botão são desenhados utilizando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer>e célula estilos especificados através de propriedades, tais como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>não tem qualquer efeito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn"></xref> class to the default state.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn"> </xref> classe para o estado predefinido.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the column by setting the following properties.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inicializa a coluna definindo as seguintes propriedades.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A>|A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>.| |The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A>| Um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>. | | A propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>do objeto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>devolvido pela propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>. | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>|</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o modelo utilizado para criar novas células.

trans-unit.source: The constructor for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn> class initializes this property to a newly created <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>.
trans-unit.target: O construtor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn>classe inicializa esta propriedade para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell> criado recentemente</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Alterar as propriedades do modelo de célula não imediatamente afetará a interface de utilizador (IU) das células da coluna existente.

trans-unit.source: These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method).
trans-unit.target: Estas alterações são aparente apenas depois da coluna é novamente gerada (por exemplo, ao ordenar a coluna ou através de uma chamada para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that all other cells in the column are modeled after.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> que todos os outras células na coluna estão modeladas após.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property could not be cast to a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado quando a definição desta propriedade não pode ser convertido para um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this column.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia exata desta coluna.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to duplicate a column of button cells.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método para duplicar uma coluna de células do botão.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa o clonado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the column's default cell style.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo de célula predefinido da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by this property has an initial <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>devolvido por esta propriedade tem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>valor da propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> de inicial</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: This value overrides the value specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, but may be overridden by other cell style properties.
trans-unit.target: Este valor substitui o valor especificado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo, mas pode ser substituído por outras propriedades de estilo de célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [estilos de célula no controlo Windows Forms DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When visual styles are enabled, the buttons in a button column are painted using a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer> and cell styles specified through properties such as DefaultCellStyle have no effect.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando estilos visuais estiverem ativados, os botões numa coluna botão são desenhados utilizando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer>e estilos de célula especificados através de propriedades, tais como DefaultCellStyle é não tem qualquer efeito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied as the default style.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> aplicada como o estilo predefinido.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flat-style appearance of the button cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o aspecto do estilo de plana das células do botão na coluna.

trans-unit.source: The FlatStyle property specifies the appearance of the cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade FlatStyle Especifica o aspeto das células na coluna.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.FlatStyle%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.FlatStyle%2A>propriedade do objeto devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.FlatStyle%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definição desta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.FlatStyle%2A>apresentar a coluna de propriedade de cada célula na coluna e as atualizações.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para as células individuais, defina os valores das células depois de definir o valor de coluna.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref> value indicating the appearance of the buttons in the column.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref> valor que indica o aspecto dos botões da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default text displayed on the button cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto predefinido apresentado na célula do botão.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell> contained in the column that has as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A> property value of `true` displays the Text property value on the cell's button.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>contidos na coluna que tenha como um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>valor da propriedade de `true` apresenta o valor de propriedade de texto no botão da célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>

trans-unit.source: If there is an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, changing this property refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Se existir um associados <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo, a alteração desta propriedade atualiza a apresentação de coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the text.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que contém o texto.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando definir esta propriedade, o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma cadeia que descreve a coluna.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que descreve a coluna.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text*> property value is displayed as the button text for cells in this column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text*>valor da propriedade é apresentado como o texto do botão para as células nesta coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text*>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of a button cell is displayed as the text on the button.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>de botão de um célula é apresentada como o texto no botão.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The UseColumnTextForButtonValue property allows you to either set the button text for each cell, or to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text%2A> property value for all of the button cells.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade UseColumnTextForButtonValue permite-lhe optar por definir o texto do botão para cada célula ou utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text%2A>valor da propriedade para todas as células do botão.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>propriedade do objeto devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definição desta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>apresentar a coluna de propriedade de cada célula na coluna e as atualizações.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para as células individuais, defina os valores das células depois de definir o valor de coluna.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text*> property value is displayed on buttons in the column; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue*> property value of each cell is displayed on its button.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <> </> *> valor da propriedade é apresentado nos botões na coluna; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se o <> </> *> valor da propriedade de cada célula é apresentado no respetivo botão.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>
